LanguageData.MakeTincture.label: brew mushroom tincture
LanguageData.MakeTincture.description: Instill mushrooms into tincture. Useful for medicine. Requires basic understanding of cooking. Produces 1.
LanguageData.MakeTincture_Bulk.label: brew bottles of mushroom tincture
LanguageData.MakeTincture_Bulk.description: Instill a few bottles of tincture from mushrooms. Useful for medicine. Requires basic understanding of cooking. Produces 4.
LanguageData.MakeTinctureHealroot.label: brew healroot tincture
LanguageData.MakeTinctureHealroot.description: Instill healroot into a tincture. Useful for medicine. Requires basic understanding of cooking. Produces 1.
LanguageData.BrewMedicalDrink.label: brew medical drink
LanguageData.BrewMedicalDrink.description: Brew a bottle of healthy medical drink from healroot and hops or yeast. Requires basic understanding of cooking. Produces 1.
